name: Udacity project 02 (Popular Movies Stage 2)
tagline: Based on P2 : Popular Movies Stage 2 under Udacity Android Developer Nanodegree Program.
body:
# Udacity_Project_02 It is based on Popular Movies Stage 2 Project of Android Developer Nanodegree Program. The app has a main screen displaying a grid of movies to choose from. After choosing the movie from the grid , it gives the details of that movie like Rating, Release Date, Trailers , Overviews etc. *** This android app has features of :
i. Choosing Categories of Movies(Top Rated, Popular or Favorite)
ii. Saving Favorite movies into Database (using Content Provider).
iii. Share the Trailer of Movie using Share Intent.
iv. Watch Trailer of Favorite Movie (in Browser or Youtube App).
v. Master Detail Flow Layout(suitable for Tablet User Interface)
vi. Favorite Movie Data is available in Offline mode.
*** Libraries Used : I Stetho for Chrome Developer Support in Database Access [Stetho Library Link](http://facebook.github.io/stetho/)
II Picasso Library for loading images or displaying placeholders[Picasso Library Link](http://square.github.io/picasso/)
In order to run this Application , an API KEY is Needed which can be obtained from [Tmdb Website](https://www.themoviedb.org/?language=en) for API Calling.
Please add the API_KEY in gradle.properties file for build.gradle ## Sample Screenshots ![Screenshot 1](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7g_-2YXAZJqLS1tYVp4SlZEd00)
